author: dkhaywood
msg: PojoAdapter - removed commented out listener/instance stuff; removed unused fields; retrofitted to implement Instance<NakedObjectSpecification>; lexically moved around methods to see its core responsibilities better

author: dkhaywood
msg: added ObjectToNakedObjectTransformer.java - a commons-collection Transformer implementation that uses PersistorUtil to wrap up a collection of Objects to NakedObjects.

author: dkhaywood
msg: Added dependency to apache commons collection in no-architecture's pom.xml (thereby available for rest of framework)

author: dkhaywood
msg: Added dependency to apache commons collection; removed our IteratorEnumeration and replaced with commons collection equiv.

author: dkhaywood
msg: no-architecture: added Ensure, providing Ensure#ensureThat  --- similar to the existing Assert, but using Hamcrest matchers.
